summary: This script adds syntax for Mind component files
name: Mind_syntax
description:
This script adds syntax for Mind component files: adl, idt, itf and c source files.

From http://mind.ow2.org/

MIND is an implementation of the Fractal component model for the development of embedded softwares It provides an architecture compilation tool-chain, a component library and an integrated development environment based on Eclipse. 

This script is based on Karthick Gururaj SystemC script: http://www.vim.org/scripts/script.php?script_id=835
install_details: Untar the tarball in your vim home folder. See README.mind_syntax for more details.
